CustomField.description: When enabled, an async callout is made to https://api.status.salesforce.com to get additional details about the current org, including the org's release version and release number. This information is then stored on the Log__c record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, an async callout is made to https://api.status.salesforce.com to get additional details about the current org, including the org's release version and release number. This information is then stored on the Log__c record.
CustomField.label: Enable Status API Callout
